name: dnd-orchestration
description: A helpful repo that clones & installs the DnD API and frontend and gets everything all set up for you

scripts.install: npm run cloneapi && npm run clonefrontend
scripts.cloneapi: git clone https://github.com/r-best/DnD-API.git && cd DnD-API && npm install && cd ..
scripts.clonefrontend: git clone https://github.com/r-best/DnD-Frontend.git && cd DnD-Frontend && npm install && cd ..
